English:
Hey, you.
You're Yuuko Kamishiro, right?
Chinese:
喂……妳是……
神代悠子吧？
German:
He, du.
Du bist Yuuko Kamishiro, nicht wahr?

English:
I heard about you from [p].
What are doing in a place like this?
Chinese:
我從[p]那聽說了妳的事，
妳在這種地方做什麼？
Korean:
[p]에게서 얘기는 들었어
뭐하고 있는 거야, 이런 곳에서?
German:
[p] hat mir von dir erzählt.
Was machst du denn hier?

English:
Kyoko told me what was going on.
She said [p] would be here.
German:
Kyoko hat mir gesagt, was gerade passiert.
Sie meinte, [p] würde hier sein.

Korean: 아아, 그 녀석에게 볼일이 있다는 건가

English:
[p] is in here.
With the loudmouth.
Chinese:
他在這裡面，
跟一個煩人的傢伙一起……
Korean:
그 녀석은 이 안에 있어
시끄러운 녀석도 함께 있지만…
German:
[p] ist da drin.
Mit der Quasselstrippe.

English:
You had a very serious look on your face.
What were you looking at?
Chinese:
妳剛剛一臉認真樣，
在看什麼？
Korean:
방금 전엔 진지한 얼굴로
뭘 보고 있었던 거야?
German:
Du hast gerade ein sehr ernstes Gesicht gemacht.
Was hast du dir denn angesehen?

English:
*Monthly Special: Hamburger Set Menu!
Huge Portions! Thick and Juicy Hamburgers!
Extra Rice Free, Year-Round!*
Chinese:
“季節限定「漢堡肉X漢堡肉定食」！
衝擊性的份量！雙層漢堡肉讓你吃到牙癢癢！
～白飯長年免費無限供應～”
Korean:
"계절 한정「햄버그햄버그한 정식」!
충격적인 볼륨! 밉살스러울 정도로 고기고기한 햄버그!!
~밥 리필은 영원히 무료~"
German:
*Monatsangebot: Hamburger-Menü!
Riesenportionen! Saftige Hamburger!
Reisbeilage immer gratis!*

English: Okay, then, I'll see you around.
German: Na gut, wir sehen uns dann.
